titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Lieutenant General of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1641-1649 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare 1648. and are to be sold at Roches building.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
